members.signatureBeforeChange: int fontProc (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
members.signatureAfterChange: int fontProc (int nextHandler, int theEvent, int userData)
diff: -			if (OS.GetEventParameter (theEvent, OS.kEventParamFMFontFamily, OS.typeSInt16, null, 2, null, fontFamily) == OS.noErr) {
+			if (OS.GetEventParameter (theEvent, OS.kEventParamATSUFontID, OS.typeUInt32, null, 4, null, fontID) == OS.noErr) {
+				OS.ATSUFindFontName (fontID [0], OS.kFontFamilyName, OS.kFontNoPlatformCode, OS.kFontNoScriptCode, OS.kFontNoLanguageCode, 0, null, actualLength, null);
+				OS.ATSUFindFontName (fontID [0], OS.kFontFamilyName, OS.kFontNoPlatformCode, OS.kFontNoScriptCode, OS.kFontNoLanguageCode, buffer.length, buffer, actualLength, null);
+	OS.ATSUFindFontName (handle, OS.kFontFamilyName, OS.kFontNoPlatformCode, OS.kFontNoScriptCode, OS.kFontNoLanguageCode, 0, null, actualLength, null);
+	OS.ATSUFindFontName (handle, OS.kFontFamilyName, OS.kFontNoPlatformCode, OS.kFontNoScriptCode, OS.kFontNoLanguageCode, buffer.length, buffer, actualLength, null);
